#titlebar("Featured Resources" "" "" "red") #subtitlebar("The Antarctica Project" "View Resource" "Coll_MMAP.TheAntarcticaProject-ReadMeFirst" "red") Check out the introductory piece (a downloadable PDF file) on this curriculum from the Middle-School Mathematics through Applications Project (MMAP). The full MMAP unit, The Antarctica Project, is available on Curriki, and focuses on engaging students to use math skills through ?real world? scenarios.
#subtitlebar("American Revolution Jeopardy" "View Resource" "Coll_wknox.Americanrevolutionjeopardy" "red") The teacher from Louisiana and Curriki member who contributed this resource (a downloadable PPT file), suggests it can be used with high school students for individual study practice or as a class game. It ?tests student's recall of people, years, events, places, and reasons of the revolutionary period.?
#subtitlebar("Persuasive Essay Rubric" "View Resource" "Coll_quacksclass.PersuasiveWritingRubricforUpperElementary" "red") A teacher from Illinois and Curriki member offers this rubric (a downloadable PDF) for use with upper elementary students and featuring the ?OREO? model ? Opinion, Reasons, Explanation, Opinions (restated). It also uses a student-friendly design (funky typeface!) and space for teachers to include comments.
